abstract.title: Principia Metaphysica
abstract.subtitle: A Geometric Framework for Unification from M-Theory on TCS G2 Manifolds

paragraphs.text: We present Principia Metaphysica, a geometric framework deriving the Standard Model, gravity, and cosmology from M-theory compactification on a Twisted Connected Sum G2 manifold. Beginning in a {D_bulk}-dimensional bulk spacetime of signature (24,2), Sp(2,R) gauge fixing yields an effective {D_after_sp2r}-dimensional intermediate stage (explicit decomposition: 26D = 4D x T^15 x G2(7D)), followed by G2 compactification to the observed {D_observable}D universe. Three chiral fermion generations arise from n_gen = |chi_eff|/48 = {n_gen}, where the divisor 48 = 24x2 reflects both the F-theory index theorem (Sethi-Vafa-Witten 1996) and a Z2 factor from Sp(2,R) parity identification across the two time dimensions (Bars 2006).

The framework relates {total_predictions} Standard Model parameters to manifold topology, flux quantization, and effective torsion. 55 parameters are pure predictions; three inputs constrain the theory: two scale calibrations (VEV coefficient 1.5859, 1/alpha_GUT coefficient 1/(10pi) ~ 0.0318) and the Higgs mass (fixes Re(T) = 7.086). Two PMNS parameters (theta_13, delta_CP) are fitted to NuFIT 6.0 pending explicit Yukawa calculation.

{predictions_within_1sigma} of {total_predictions} parameter values lie within 1sigma of experimental data, with {exact_matches} central value matches including theta_23 = {theta_23} deg (from G2 holonomy SU(3) symmetry forcing shadow_kuf = shadow_chet). Testable predictions include proton decay lifetime tau_p ~ 10^34 years (Hyper-K testable) and gravitational wave dispersion eta ~ 0.10 from effective torsion. The effective torsion T_omega = -0.884 arises from G-flux on the Ricci-flat TCS G2 manifold (not geometric torsion).

footnote.text: The fields are named Primordial Spinor Field (Psi_P) and Attractor Scalar (Phi_M). Historical names Pneuma and Mashiach reflect philosophical inspiration but are not used in technical discussions.
